description: Addresses lack of awareness about endangered species in Agder, Norway through an educational game with AI chatbot 'Naturens Vokter' (Nature's Guardian). Makes biodiversity education fun and engaging with interactive map showing 400+ animal species, gamified conservation education, and connection between local actions and species survival. Targets UN SDG 15 (Life on Land), SDG 13 (Climate Action), and SDG 4 (Quality Education).
